name: Devilish Bodhisattva
description:
A game made for Mini Jam 120: Hell

In the wise words of Ghandi: Let someone else do it.

You are an average denizen of hell, with a not so average obsession of pacifism and jewelry. One day, you found yourself in quite a pickle... You can neither attack, nor run away. Can you survive this encounter?

---

Controls

Left and right arrows - Movement

Z - Jump

Hold X - Shield

---

Tips

- The boss attacks in a fixed pattern. Learn it!

- The boss can also hit the barrels that fall from the skies. If so...

- Your shield only has a limited charge. Use it wisely!

---

Updates

V1.1 - Added sound effects and music, added knockback on hit, fixed wall collision.

P.s Web version will be updated once the game jam is done.
